title: Q1 - If an Indian userâ€™s data is processed abroad (e.g., on AWS servers in the U.S.), is the foreign company also bound by DPDPA?
description: - Yes. DPDPA applies to any entity, Indian or foreign, that processes personal data of individuals within India, if the processing is related to offering goods, services, or profiling individuals in India.
